amendment.description: Amendment earmarks $5 million annually for bioenergy training and education targeted to minority and socially disadvantaged farmers and ranchers.
amendment.purpose: Part B amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 107-178 to earmark $5 million annually for bioenergy training and education targeted to minority and socially disadvantaged farmers and ranchers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
